mapper.select: select p.posttitle,p.cateno,p.postno,p.postcontent,p.regdate from post p , category c , users u where c.id = u. id and p.cateno = c.cateno and c.id= #{id} and p.cateno = #{cateNo} order by p.postno desc
select p.cateno ,p.postcontent ,p.postno ,p.posttitle ,p.regdate from post p ,(select max(regdate) regdate from post ) b where p.regdate = b.regdate
select postno ,cateno ,posttitle ,postcontent ,regdate from post where postNo = #{postNo }
